item.title: Israel orders Khan Younis evacuation ahead of 'unprecedented attack'
item.description: Residents have been told to move to western Gaza in one of the largest evacuation orders of recent months.

item.title: South Africa to pursue appeal against Nigerian pastor acquitted of rape
item.description: Timothy Omotoso, who denies assaulting women from his church, has reportedly returned to Nigeria.

item.title: Israel allowing 'minimal' food into Gaza after pressure from allies, Netanyahu says
item.description: Benjamin Netanyahu says aid will enter for "practical and diplomatic" reasons, after weeks of blockade.

item.title: Joe Biden diagnosed with 'aggressive' prostate cancer
item.description: The disease has spread to the 82-year-old's bones but his office said the cancer could be effectively managed.

item.title: Mexico mourns Navy cadets killed in Brooklyn Bridge ship crash
item.description: América Sánchez, 20, and Adal Jair Maldonado Marcos, 23, died when the tall ship lost power and drifted into the bridge.
